description:
**Problem**
store_runtime_error_payload drops details for WAL index/replay errors, and lock permission_denied omits path/operation details. REALTIME_ERRORS.md expects structured details for machine handling.

**Where**
- src/daemon/ipc.rs: store_runtime_error_payload (WalIndex/WalReplay)
- src/daemon/ipc.rs: store_lock_error_payload (PermissionDenied without details)

**Design**
- Extend error payload mapping to include details for WAL index/replay errors (e.g., store_epoch_mismatch, prev_sha_mismatch, index_corrupt).
- Include permission_denied details for lock IO ({path, operation}).

**Acceptance**
- WAL/index error payloads include structured details per registry.
- Permission denied on lock IO includes path and operation.

**Files**
- src/daemon/ipc.rs
- src/daemon/ops.rs
- src/core/error.rs (if new details types needed)
title: IPC error payloads: include details for WAL/index + lock permission_denied

description:
**Problem**
ReplRigOptions uses boolean flags (e.g. use_store_id_override, checkpoints_enabled) that hide intent and violate type_design.md; callers can misread or mix states.

**Design**
- Introduce small enums (e.g. StoreIdOverride::{Enabled, Disabled}, CheckpointMode::{Enabled, Disabled}) or a single ReplRigMode struct with typed fields.
- Replace bool fields in ReplRigOptions and update call sites/tests to use the enums.
- Keep defaults explicit via Default impl or helper constructors.

**Acceptance**
- [ ] No boolean flags remain for ReplRigOptions modes.
- [ ] Call sites updated to use typed enums.
- [ ] Tests compile and pass.

**Files**: tests/integration/fixtures/repl_rig.rs, tests/integration/daemon/repl_e2e.rs, tests/e2e.rs
title: Replace ReplRigOptions bool flags with typed enums
